meanings.definition: A person or thing that provokes or incites.
meanings.sent1: The provokers of the argument were finally asked to leave.
meanings.sent2: The protestors were the main provokers of change in the community.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous provokers of laughter in the classroom were the class clowns.
meanings.sent4: Her bold statements acted as provokers of thought among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The provokers of fear in the haunted house made it a thrilling experience.
